statusHistory.reason: Historical crew, disbanded approximately 100 years before current timeline
Crew disbanded when Dorry and Brogy began their duel on Little Garden

keyMoments.title: Giant Warrior Pirates Revealed
keyMoments.description: The legendary Giant Warrior Pirates are revealed through the introduction of their co-captains Dorry and Brogy, who ruled the seas a century ago.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the historical significance of the Giant Warrior Pirates as one of the most powerful crews in history.

keyMoments.title: Captains' Bounties Revealed
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 reveals that both Dorry and Brogy had bounties of 100,000,000 berries each, extraordinarily high for their era a century ago.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the legendary status of the Giant Warrior Pirates' captains and their threat level to the World Government.

achievements.achievement: Legendary pirate crew composed entirely of giants from Elbaph
achievements.description: One of the most feared and powerful crews to ever sail the seas, with co-captains each holding 100,000,000 berry bounties.
